name: Colonize Mars
description:
We truly live in the darkest timeline, with the ultra rich having uncontrolled access to all of outer space, slavery is on their mind. It's only a matter of time before we reach indentured servitude on Mars thanks to a special someone obsessed with the idea.

A text-based adventure game about our dystopian future, which is closing in upon us. Choose wisely for all your choices matter in the outcome.
